text: Hello, I'm Estella.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: When you travel abroad, it's always a good idea to pick up some common phrases in the local language.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Even though English is commonly used in most countries around the world now, not everybody feels comfortable speaking to a random stranger on the street.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: So if you are able to break the ice by using their own language, you will definitely be appreciated and make a good first impression.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Here are the top 10 phrases to help you out in Chinese.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: And simple greeting like hi, hello, hey.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: I'll see you again.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Goodbye.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Always an important thing to know.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Thank you.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Literally, this means no plight.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: What people will hear however is you're welcome.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: 我聽不懂 a very important phrase in any language I don't understand 這是什麼?
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Here's one that might get used quite a lot What is this?
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: 在哪裡 If you're lost or trying to find a specific place, then you'll need this.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Just put the place name at the beginning followed by 在哪裡 and you've got where it is.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: 我想吃飯 It's hard to get around on an empty stomach.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: So this phrase will help you find something delicious.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: I wanna eat.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Since you might not always see a price tag, being able to ask how much is good to know.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: There might be a lot of times when you're unsure what something is called, but you know you want it.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: In that case, pointing to it and saying, I want this one can help you get what you need.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: With these phrases, you'll be well on your way to traveling around and meeting new people in Chinese-speaking countries.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: To learn more vocabulary and useful phrases, come over to our basic Mandarin on edX.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Also, follow us on Facebook and Twitter to get updated about MandarinX.
speaker: SPEAKER_00
